column4: hey guys , yesterday i mounted 2 partitions - today i turned on the pc and they are gone ....... any help ?
you have to use "sudo gedit /etc/fstab" to edit it
what are you trying to do again?
what are you trying to mount, and where do you want to mount it?
you have to set the uid=1000 option while mounting so you own it persay
I dont know how you mounted it, but if you used the fstab, yes, you have to edit that
o rly?  well then, what happens when you click it?
no idea, we will need to troubleshoot more, but right now I do know something is SNAFU
(nice version) Situation Normal: All Fouled Up
